item.title: What to Know About the Deadly D.C. Shooting of Israeli Embassy Aides
item.description: Two employees of the Israeli Embassy in Washington were killed. A suspect was charged with murder.

item.title: Trump Rebukes Putin, Calls Escalation of Attacks ‘Absolutely Crazy’
item.description: “He’s sending rockets into cities and killing people, and I don’t like it at all,” President Trump said of his Russian counterpart.

item.title: Israeli Airstrike Kills Doctor’s Children, Gaza Officials Say
item.description: Two more children were missing, and the doctor’s husband and one other child were injured in the strike on Friday, the officials said. Israel said it ...

item.title: 5 Years After George Floyd’s Murder, the Backlash Takes Hold
item.description: The Black Lives Matter movement, kicked into high gear after Mr. Floyd’s murder on May 25, 2020, has given way to the politics of “white grievance” ch...

item.title: A Quiet Funeral in Israel for Victim of Washington Shooting
item.description: Yaron Lischinsky, 30, was buried on Sunday in the small town where his family lived.
